name: Alkilith
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Amorphous: The alkilith can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
traits.False Appearance: While the alkilith is motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary slime or fungus.
traits.Foment Madness: Any creature that isn't a demon that starts its turn within 30 feet of the alkilith must succeed on a DC 18+1d8 + 14 Wisdom saving throw, or it hears a faint buzzing in its head for a moment and has disadvantage on its next attack roll, saving throw, or ability check.
traits.Magic Resistance: The alkilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Multiattack: The alkilith makes three tentacle attacks.
actions.Tentacle: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d8 + 4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) acid damage.
